Title: Prohibits mobile sports wagering operators from providing counseling, therapy, and treatment services for bettors in New York
Summary: Requires mobile sports wagering operators when providing information regarding compulsive play, all links and referrals for counseling, therapy or treatment services shall direct account holders to the problem gambling services webpage maintained by the office of addiction services and supports.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting mobile sports wagering operators from providing counseling, therapy, and treatment services for bettors in New York
